page.title: 20MOVING SCHOOLS
page.content: Today is our last day at Mont Nicolle primary school! We have taken all our work down from the walls. We were all given a book as a leaving present and we have got the teachers to sign their names in them as a memento of our time here. Some of the girls will be having a little cry this afternoon. So it's goodbye Mont Nicolle from: Darren Le Gallais, Cavan Vetier, Lucy Hackett, Martin Le Guillou, Wayne Maloret, Justin Thorn, Julie Jubb, Joel Nicol, Samantha Shield, Tania Paul, Rebecca Bailey, Karen Crocker, Kristy Morris, Elaina Samson, Emma Allan, Christian Nicolle, Colette Barker, Susie Penn, Wayne Larbalastier, David Nimmo, Matthew Webster, Alison Maloret, Sarah Pinel, Sasha Costello, Natalie Freeman, Kieron Searle, Hazel Boocock, Emily Allchurch, Sara Trauffer, and Tracey Gunton.
